name: Ünterwerks
description:
Uh oh, looks like you fell down a big hole and now you have to find a way out! You should really pay more attention to where you're going...

Explore a mysterious under-ground civilization (that's totally not a rip off of Undertale) and discover a way back to the world above!

Disclaimer: 

Though you can finish, this game is still in development, and is missing content

Controls:

  • WASDA or Arrow keys - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Pick up / Interact / Talk
  • O - Respawn

Special Thanks To:

@YappingPat for the better sounding SFX and character sounds in the game

I used this guy's color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/cc-29

All my buds that encouraged me through Devtober
